about_the_game:
Grab an E-book and read about Ortank (the main hero of Tales of Anturia: Hejstos game) and how he became an Ice-Raven.

Don`t worry absolutly no spoilers to the game content, everything happened before you became Ortank in the game.


Tales of Anturia: Ice Ravens - Ebook can be found in the game’s install directory within the folder "Tales of Anturia: Ice Ravens - Ebook" (Steam\SteamApps\common\Hejstos) after you have downloaded the DLC.
detailed_description:

Don`t worry absolutly no spoilers to the game content, everything happened before you became Ortank in the game.


Tales of Anturia: Ice Ravens - Ebook can be found in the game’s install directory within the folder "Tales of Anturia: Ice Ravens - Ebook" (Steam\SteamApps\common\Hejstos) after you have downloaded the DLC.

short_description: Enchance your game expierience with an short story about Ortank (the main hero of Tales of Anturia: Hejstos game) and how he became an Ice-Raven. + Find out intresting stuff about the world lore.
